title: Why is OCE stuck with Blind Pick norms when every other server has the option to draft a norms game?
body: I hate blind pick. Its terrible. People fight over lane calls, and the team already hates each other before the loading screen. Why can't we have Draft norms like everyone else. This will also help the ranked player base because it will stop people taking first-time champs into ranked because they have to put up with lane arguments and interlock players.

replies.body:
I just want the role choice. I dont really care if we get a pick and ban phase (the actual draft part).
It just sucks that people fight because someone can press "ctrl + V" first.

>
> I just want the role choice. I dont really care if we get a pick and ban phase (the actual draft part).
> It just sucks that people fight because someone can press "ctrl + V" first.

And not just that, People dont all connect to the lobby at the same time so basically who ever has the best internet connection will almost always get the spot they want
And, they cant see the past messages before they joined. So they are certain that they called first.

> [{quoted}](name=Derikay,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=cgIAI9sJ,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2016-11-15T08:33:23.681+0000)
>
> And, they cant see the past messages before they joined. So they are certain that they called first.

Agreed, So a simple fix would be to not allow chat until all 5 of the team members have joined to help minimise the fights and unneeded BS

Or have the chat system keep a log that updates each player as they join, and display chat messages as the server receives them, not have chat messages display in the order that the player receives them.  So many people have no abstract reasoning & are convinced others are lying etc
Because Riot thinks we love Blind pick so much that it is now the most popular summoners rift game mode next to ranked ;) (I hate this game mode and want normal draft).

I agree with you, i hate blind pick for fight over lane calls, we can't see the enemies picks. i play for fun only if it's necessary. if the queues problem, i'd prefer to just remove blind pick and put draft normal instead. I don't play normal games because of  those issues really. Even before i queue, i already get started to get stressful to call lanes and argue.

I mean, I understand we are a small server, and it would make queues longer. but it would resolve a bunch of salt related fights, Lane stealing/Instalocking as well as it will stop people from playing ranked just for the draft but treat it like norms

In servers (such as ours), with small populations some queues have issues with queue times as they aren't wildly popular. This is why [dominion](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/retiring-dominion) was retired, and why we have a [queue schedule](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/wgM0WBsO-queue-schedule-updated-for-622). 

For preseason/season 7, it was announced that normal draft pick would [only be available in 3/10 regions](http://www.riftherald.com/lol-patch-notes/2016/11/9/13574822/lol-normal-draft-queue-removed-why).

Even though our population is small, wouldn't it be better to get rid of blind pick and just completely replace it with draft? 
There are a hefty amount of people who are only playing norms at this time and almost all of them want draft pick so wouldn't you just be pleasing people to change it out? The only difference is champ select. I know you're not Riot but it doesn't seem smart to keep up a mode that people don't like when a very small adaption to it is what everybody wants.
Solution: Tell the government to let refugees in or tell everyone  to make more babies, though the latter one is a long term investment....

we did have team builder at one time but died because no one played it.. i think once because i was watching a movie whilst playing it took me 36 mins to find a game.. I STILL WANT MY MAGE ICON :( ONE GAME OFF

2 things that could make blind pick tolerable:
1.  Ditch the role calling  - the most toxic element of normals. Tilted before the game starts, quite often not getting to play a role you want to play. instalockers - OMG, please get rid of role calling. Make role selection the same as ranked (no need for bans).
2. Give us 20 seconds before game launches (everyone's champ is locked in) where we know what the comp of the other team is so we can choose appropriate runes. Sick of wasting armour runes vs Vel Koz or MR vs Yasuo etc.
